modName: A Drained Blood Line - Episode I
summary: Travel to Dawnstar\'s Inn and find its newest resident Ann. Ann\'s Parents have been taken. She knows where they are and has been told to find you if she ever wants to seem them again. But why? Find out in the fist part of this thrilling Quest line!
descriptionHtml:
One thousand downloads in the first week. thanks so much for the support everyone. look forward to the next episode!

Travel to Dawnstar\'s Inn and find its newest resident Ann. Ann\'s Parents have been taken. She knows where they are and has been told to find you if she ever wants to seem them again. But why? Find out in the fist part of this thrilling Quest line!

Features

- 3 new areas
- Custom sword
- Custom Quest
- lore friendly
- 100% working and ready
- Fully Voice Acted NPCs
- a new episode in 2 weeks

Install
-Put the esp. and bsa. files into your data folder.

Mod updated almost daily check back here
Want to see how the next episode is coming along? check my stream here: http://www.twitch.tv/zackdw
author: ZackDW
